pythagoras.d
Class Point

java.lang.Object
  pythagoras.d.AbstractPoint
      pythagoras.d.Point
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, IPoint
public class Point
extends AbstractPoint
implements Serializable

Represents a point on a plane.

See Also:
Serialized Form
